SENTENCE.STRING: is a dormant volcano in the Hawaiian Islands, one of five volcanoes which together form the island of Hawai'i.
Pu'u Wekiu, one of numerous cinder cones on the summit plateau, is the highest point in the state of Hawaii at 13,796 feet (4,205 m).
is the tallest mountain in the world when measured from base to summit, since
base is located on the seafloor about beneath the surface of the Pacific Ocean, bringing
total height to well over 33000 ft.
In the Hawaiian language, mauna kea means "white mountain", a reference to
summit being regularly snow-capped during the Northern Hemisphere winter.
